DataElement.preferredName: Patient Renal And Hepatic Function Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not applicable coded response regarding whether a patient meets the criteria for renal and hepatic function for participation in a clinical trial.
